Text: RE ADA and general issuesSara I learned that the proposed draft was up for signature by members of the association shortly The vicechairman of ADA indicated that he thought that it was late to make suggestions for this round but Enrons participation would be welcome for future developments He confirmed that the model agreement is aimed at transactions between residents of Argentina where one of the parties is a local financial entity and basically at financial derivatives While commodities are mentioned in the draft they are not aiming at covering commodities derivaties at this stage Note that only banks were backing the project I have to confirm all this with the secretary of the association who I could not reach last week My list of ADA members is slightly outdated but I count on obtaining a new from him when I reach him We could arrange meetings with some of this people when you visit Maybe we could organize an informal lunch at the firm One of my colleagues has been very much involved in lobbying for derivatives tax legislation You could meet with him when you come Other news is that they have resubmitted the draft law on netting to Congress Best regards Patricia Mensaje original De Sara Shackleton SMTP Enviado el Mircoles de Febrero de pm Para Asunto ADA and general issues Patricia I was wondering if you had an opportunity to speak with any persons associated with the Argentine Derivatives Association in connection with our discussion of last week I cant recall if you were going to try to speak with the lawyers for Citibank andor Morgan to determine whether the ADA might welcome our participation in the association and specifically with respect to the template currently in circulation I think you were also going to attempt to locate a current membership list for the association Please advise when you have further information I am trying to plan several trips to Argentina and Brazil I am considering a trip to BA during the week of February Will you be in town that week During my visit my tax colleague from Houston and I will try to meet with local tax consultants and organizations lobbying for tax reformation Regards Sara Este mensaje es confidencial Puede contener informacion amparada por el secreto profesional Si usted ha recibido este email por error por favor comuniquenoslo inmediatamente via email y tenga la amabilidad de eliminarlo de su sistema no debera copiar el mensaje ni divulgar su contenido a ninguna persona Muchas gracias This message is confidential It may also contain information that is privileged or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you have received it by mistake please let us know by email immediately and delete it from your system should also not copy the message nor disclose its contents to anyone Many thanks

RE Review of Enron North America Corp ISDA Schedule Cc You will have our comments on the ISDA before Sept In fact not much has changed at the documentation level I would be most pleased to meet with you Should you have time lets also squeeze a lunch or a diner in your busy agenda Best regards Patricia Mensaje original De Sara Shackleton SMTP Enviado el Viernes de Septiembre de pm Para CC Brent Hendry Susan Bailey Asunto Review of Enron North America Corp ISDA Schedule I am planning to travel to Argentina and Brazil in the next days Will you be able to provide me with your written comments on the draft ISDA Schedule by September Also will you be in the BA office during the period from September through I will schedule a meeting with you as I finalize plans Enrons office will be closed on Monday September I look forward to hearing from you after that date Regards Sara Este mensaje es confidencial Puede contener informacion amparada por el secreto profesional Si usted ha recibido este email por error por favor comuniquenoslo inmediatamente via email y tenga la amabilidad de eliminarlo de su sistema no debera copiar el mensaje ni divulgar su contenido a ninguna persona Muchas gracias This message is confidential It may also contain information that is privileged or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you have received it by mistake please let us know by email immediately and delete it from your system should also not copy the message nor disclose its contents to anyone Many thanks

RE Review of Enron ISDA Schedule Cc I will be pleased to see ou either on Tuesday am Wednesday afternoon anytime before or Thursday at your convenience You shall receive the comments to the Schedule and other documents shortly The English speaking tax lawyer you should contact Gabriel Gotlib at or at In the meantime I will forward you a preview of an article on taxation that Gabriel and I have written Looking forward to seeing you Best regards Patricia Mensaje original De Sara Shackleton SMTP Enviado el Viernes de Septiembre de pm Para Asunto Review of Enron ISDA Schedule I will be in Enrons BA office from September September Tuesday Friday I would like to schedule some time to review the ISDA Schedule previously sent to you for comment Other than the morning and early afternoon of Sept Wed I am free to schedule an appointment with you If you have comments to the Schedule please send them to me in Houston I will be in the Houston office until Monday afternoon Also does the Marval firm have an English speaking tax lawyer who could assist Enron Houston tax on Argentine trading issues Please let me know as soon as possible I look forward to hearing from you Regards Sara Este mensaje es confidencial Puede contener informacion amparada por el secreto profesional Si usted ha recibido este email por error por favor comuniquenoslo inmediatamente via email y tenga la amabilidad de eliminarlo de su sistema no debera copiar el mensaje ni divulgar su contenido a ninguna persona Muchas gracias This message is confidential It may also contain information that is privileged or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you have received it by mistake please let us know by email immediately and delete it from your system should also not copy the message nor disclose its contents to anyone Many thanks
